page.title: 16 Government.
page.content:
There is a tiered system of{government which runs the country and maintains services right down to local level. {Roads}are maintained by departments according to their importance. The main{Weyhill}road is being extensively improved by funds from{Central {Government}whilst local roads and lanes are maintained by{Local {Authorities. District Councils provide the main street lighting whilst the smaller{Parish Councils comprise local inhabitants with representation on the larger bodies.
The{Community Hall}is eligible for Grants from Central and Local Government. {Bus services, gas}and {electricity}supplies, and the mains {water,}are all maintained by Public Utilities although there are moves to put some back into private ownership.
